/usr/bin/c++ -fPIC   -shared -Wl,-soname,libcloudphxx_lgrngn.so -o libcloudphxx_lgrngn.so CMakeFiles/cloudphxx_lgrngn.dir/src/lib.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cloudphxx_lgrngn.dir/src/lib_cpp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cloudphxx_lgrngn.dir/src/lib_omp.cpp.o CMakeFiles/cloudphxx_lgrngn.dir/src/lib_cuda.cu.o CMakeFiles/cloudphxx_lgrngn.dir/cmake_device_link.o  -L/usr/local/cuda/targets/x86_64-linux/lib -lcurand /usr/lib/gcc/x86_64-linux-gnu/7/libgomp.so -lpthread -lcudadevrt -lcudart_static -lrt -lpthread -ldl
